div.span: Adapted from Inventory of Greek Coin Hoards

div.pre: 714 Givkovo, c. 60 km. SE of Sofia, Bul- (171) garia, 1905 Burial: 400-350 B.C. (T) Contents: 40 EL. Pot hoard Cyzicus: st. and at least 1 hecte Disposition: various royal colls. 31 (of which 7 later sold by Hamburger Feb. 20, 1928, nos. 173-9) Regling, ZfN 1931, p. 26 (an early burial date based on the 7 coins of the Hamburger Sale) † Gerasimov, Annuaire du Musée Nat. Bulg. 1942, pp. 72-89, illus.
